about_the_game:
Faylinn’s Beach Rescue is a fast-paced hentai shoot 'em up where players take on the role of Faylinn, a brave fairy fighting to rescue beautiful beachgoers captured by demonic sea creatures.

Set in a world where magical beings secretly protect humanity, the game challenges players to battle waves of seductive sea demons, close dimensional rifts, and save sexy damsels in distress. With fluid, thrilling gameplay and an erotic anime aesthetic, Faylinn’s Beach Rescue is designed for adult audiences seeking a blend of steamy content, waifus, and exhilarating action.

content_descriptors.notes:
The protagonist loses pieces of clothing when taking damage, becoming completely nude when low in health.
The stages backgrounds are images of nude girls in sexually explicit poses and exposed bodies, that the player has to rescue from the enemies.

name: Fairy Rescue
short_description: Shoot and dodge thousands of bullets as Faylinn, a brave fairy fighting to rescue beautiful beachgoers captured by demonic sea creatures in this fast-paced hentai shoot 'em up.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
